mapper.insert: /* GuestManagMapper.getGuestManageStoreRegistSaveInsert */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORE_NMCODE A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, NMCODE_GRP_CD, NMCODE_CD, PARENT_CD, NMCODE_NM, NMCODE_ITEM_1, NMCODE_ITEM_2, USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_NMCODE WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '119' ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.NMCODE_GRP_CD = B.NMCODE_GRP_CD AND A.NMCODE_CD = B.NMCODE_CD AND A.PARENT_CD = B.PARENT_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET NMCODE_NM = B.NMCODE_NM, NMCODE_ITEM_1 = B.NMCODE_ITEM_1, NMCODE_ITEM_2 = B.NMCODE_ITEM_2, USE_YN = B.USE_YN, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.NMCODE_GRP_CD, A.NMCODE_CD, A.PARENT_CD, A.NMCODE_NM, A.NMCODE_ITEM_1, A.NMCODE_ITEM_2, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.NMCODE_GRP_CD, B.NMCODE_CD, B.NMCODE_GRP_CD, B.NMCODE_NM, B.NMCODE_ITEM_1, B.NMCODE_ITEM_2, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )
